description: Search using Glean's enterprise search API to find relevant content across your organization.

glean_api_url.info: The base URL for your Glean API instance (e.g., https://your-company.glean.com/api/index/v1).

glean_access_token.info: Your Glean API access token for authentication.

query.info: The search query to execute in Glean.

page_size.info: Maximum number of search results to return (default: 10).

request_options.info: Additional options for the search request (optional).

errors.no_results: No good Glean Search Result was found

logs.tool_built: Glean Search API Tool for Langchain
logs.fetching_content: Fetching content from Glean Search API
